title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Social Innovation Projects via Virtual Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design thinking and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners complete social issue-solving design projects using virtual collaboration tools.
Learners improve design ideas at least three times through peer evaluation and feedback processes.
Over 90% of learners enhance asynchronous communication skills via online discussions and critique sessions.
Over 70% of learners implement physical design models in virtual spaces using digital prototyping tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
